00025 template<
00026   class PRE_KEY_TYPE = uint32_t,//pre-key type, indicate the length of the pre-key.
00027   uint64_t TOTAL_BUFFER_SIZE = 30000,//300000000,//at leat 20000
00028   uint32_t CACHE_BLOCK_SIZE = 2880//CPU cache size
00029   >
00030 class AlphaSort

00032   
00033   struct PRE_KEY_POINTER_
00034   {
00035     PRE_KEY_TYPE pre_key_;
00036     uint64_t rcrd_addr_;
00037     FILE* f_;
00038 
00039     inline PRE_KEY_POINTER_(PRE_KEY_TYPE pre_key,uint64_t rcrd_addr, FILE* f)
00040     {
00041       pre_key_ = pre_key;
00042       rcrd_addr_ = rcrd_addr;
00043       f_ = f;
00044     }
00045 
00046     inline PRE_KEY_POINTER_()
00047     {
00048       pre_key_ = -1;
00049       rcrd_addr_ = -1;
00050       f_ = NULL;
00051     }
00052 
00053     
00054     bool operator == (const PRE_KEY_POINTER_& p) const
00055     {
00056       return rcrd_addr_ == p.rcrd_addr_;
00057     }
00058 
00062     bool operator < (const PRE_KEY_POINTER_& p) const
00063     {
00064       if (pre_key_== p.pre_key_)
00065       {
00066         if (f_==NULL || p.f_==NULL)
00067           return false;
00068         
00069         PRE_KEY_TYPE k=pre_key_, pk=p.pre_key_;
00070         uint32_t shift = sizeof(PRE_KEY_TYPE);
00071         fseek(f_, rcrd_addr_, SEEK_SET);
00072         uint16_t len;
00073         if (fread(&len, sizeof(uint16_t), 1, f_)!=1)
00074         {
00075           LDBG_<<"Operator <: can't read len";
00076           return false;
00077         }
00078         
00079         fseek(p.f_, p.rcrd_addr_, SEEK_SET);
00080         uint16_t plen;
00081         if (fread(&plen, sizeof(uint16_t), 1, p.f_)!=1)
00082         {
00083           LDBG_<<"Operator <: can't read len of second param";
00084           return false;
00085         }
00086 
00087         while (k == pk && len>shift && plen>shift)
00088         {
00089           fseek(f_, rcrd_addr_+sizeof(uint16_t)+shift, SEEK_SET);
00090           uint32_t s = shift+sizeof(PRE_KEY_TYPE)>len? len-shift:sizeof(PRE_KEY_TYPE);
00091           
00092           if (fread(&k,s, 1, f_ )!=1)
00093           {
00094             LDBG_<<"Operator <: can't read";
00095             return false;
00096           }
00097 
00098           fseek(p.f_, p.rcrd_addr_+sizeof(uint16_t)+shift, SEEK_SET);
00099           s = shift+sizeof(PRE_KEY_TYPE)>plen? plen-shift:sizeof(PRE_KEY_TYPE);
00100           
00101           if (fread(&pk,s, 1, p.f_ )!=1)
00102           {
00103             LDBG_<<"Operator <: can't read";
00104             return false;
00105           }
00106 
00107           shift += sizeof(PRE_KEY_TYPE);
00108         }
00109         
00110         return k< pk;
00111       }
00112       
00113       return pre_key_ < p.pre_key_;
00114     }
00115 
00116     
00120     bool operator > (const PRE_KEY_POINTER_& p) const
00121     {
00122       
00123       if (pre_key_== p.pre_key_)
00124       {
00125         if (f_==NULL || p.f_==NULL)
00126           return false;
00127         
00128         PRE_KEY_TYPE k=pre_key_, pk=p.pre_key_;
00129         uint32_t shift = sizeof(PRE_KEY_TYPE);
00130         fseek(f_, rcrd_addr_, SEEK_SET);
00131         uint16_t len;
00132         if (fread(&len, sizeof(uint16_t), 1, f_)!=1)
00133         {
00134           LDBG_<<"Operator <: can't read len";
00135           return false;
00136         }
00137         
00138         fseek(p.f_, p.rcrd_addr_, SEEK_SET);
00139         uint16_t plen;
00140         if (fread(&plen, sizeof(uint16_t), 1, p.f_)!=1)
00141         {
00142           LDBG_<<"Operator <: can't read len of second param";
00143           return false;
00144         }
00145 
00146         while (k == pk && len>shift && plen>shift)
00147         {
00148           fseek(f_, rcrd_addr_+sizeof(uint16_t)+shift, SEEK_SET);
00149           uint32_t s = shift+sizeof(PRE_KEY_TYPE)>len? len-shift:sizeof(PRE_KEY_TYPE);
00150           
00151           if (fread(&k,s, 1, f_ )!=1)
00152           {
00153             LDBG_<<"Operator <: can't read";
00154             return false;
00155           }
00156 
00157           fseek(p.f_, p.rcrd_addr_+sizeof(uint16_t)+shift, SEEK_SET);
00158           s = shift+sizeof(PRE_KEY_TYPE)>plen? plen-shift:sizeof(PRE_KEY_TYPE);
00159           
00160           if (fread(&pk,s, 1, p.f_ )!=1)
00161           {
00162             LDBG_<<"Operator <: can't read";
00163             return false;
00164           }
00165 
00166           shift += sizeof(PRE_KEY_TYPE);
00167         }
00168 
00169         return k> pk;
00170       }
00171 
00172       return pre_key_ > p.pre_key_;
00173     }
00174 
00175   friend ostream& operator <<(ostream& os, const PRE_KEY_POINTER_& v)
00176     {
00177       os<<"["<<v.pre_key_<<","<<v.rcrd_addr_<<","<<v.f_<<"]";
00178       return os;
00179     }

00187   struct T_TREE_NODE_
00188   {
00189     PRE_KEY_POINTER_ key_;
00190     size_t idx_;
00191     uint32_t idx_in_block_;
00192 
00193     inline T_TREE_NODE_(const PRE_KEY_POINTER_& key, size_t idx, uint32_t idx_in_block)
00194     {
00195       key_ = key;
00196       idx_ = idx;
00197       idx_in_block_ = idx_in_block;
00198     }
00199 
00200     inline T_TREE_NODE_()
00201     {
00202       idx_ = -1;
00203       idx_in_block_ = -1;
00204     }
00205 
00206     bool operator == (const T_TREE_NODE_& p) const
00207     {
00208       return key_.rcrd_addr_ == p.key_.rcrd_addr_;
00209     }
00210     
00211     bool operator < (const T_TREE_NODE_& p) const
00212     {
00213 //       if (key_.pre_key_ == p.key_.pre_key_)
00214 //       {
00215 //         if (idx_ == p.idx_)
00216 //           return idx_in_block_<p.idx_in_block_;
00217 //         return idx_ < p.idx_;
00218 //       }
00219       
00220       return key_ < p.key_;
00221     }
00222 
00223     bool operator > (const T_TREE_NODE_& p) const
00224     {      
00225 //       if (key_.pre_key_ == p.key_.pre_key_)
00226 //       {
00227 //         if (idx_ == p.idx_)
00228 //           return idx_in_block_ > p.idx_in_block_;
00229 //         return idx_ > p.idx_;
00230 //       }
00231 
00232       return key_ > p.key_;
00233     }
00234 
00235     bool isMax() const
00236     {
00237       return key_.pre_key_==(PRE_KEY_TYPE)-1 && key_.rcrd_addr_==(uint64_t)-1;
00238     }
00239 
00240   friend ostream& operator <<(ostream& os, const T_TREE_NODE_& v)
00241     {
00242       os<<"<"<<v.key_.pre_key_<<","<<v.idx_<<","<<v.idx_in_block_<<">";
00243       return os;
00244     }

00249 #define ND_CACHE_SIZE ((CACHE_BLOCK_SIZE-sizeof(uint32_t))/sizeof(T_TREE_NODE_))
00250 #define ND_CACHE_MAX_LEN ((ND_CACHE_SIZE+1)/2)
00251 
00255   class TREE_BUCKET_
00256   {
00257     T_TREE_NODE_ pool_[ND_CACHE_SIZE];
00258     uint32_t data_c_;
00259 
00260   public:
00261     TREE_BUCKET_()
00262     {
00263       data_c_ = 0;
00264     }
00265 
00266     bool newNode(const T_TREE_NODE_& n)
00267     {
00268       if (data_c_ >= ND_CACHE_MAX_LEN)
00269         return false;
00270 
00271       pool_[data_c_] = n;
00272       data_c_++;
00273       return true;
00274     }
00275 
00276     bool isFull()
00277     {
00278       return (data_c_ >= ND_CACHE_MAX_LEN);
00279     }
00280 
00281     bool isEmpty()
00282     {
00283       return (data_c_ == 0);
00284     }
00285     
00286     void setNodeOf(uint32_t idx, const T_TREE_NODE_& n)
00287     {
00288       IF_DLOG(idx>=ND_CACHE_SIZE)<<"TREE_BUCKET_::setNodeOf";
00289       pool_[idx] = n;
00290     }
00291 
00292     uint32_t find(const T_TREE_NODE_& n)
00293     {
00294       for(uint32_t i=0; i<data_c_; i++)
00295       {
00296         if (pool_[i]==n)
00297           return i;
00298       }
00299 
00300       return (uint32_t)-1;
00301     }
00302 
00303     T_TREE_NODE_* replace(const T_TREE_NODE_& src, const T_TREE_NODE_& des )
00304     {
00305       uint32_t idx = find(src);
00306       if (idx == (uint32_t)-1 || idx>=data_c_)
00307         return NULL;
00308 
00309       pool_[idx] = des;
00310 
00311       idx = idx%2==0? idx: idx-1;
00312       
00313       uint32_t i = 0;
00314       uint32_t c = data_c_;
00315       while (i+1<c)
00316       {
00317         if (i == idx)
00318         {
00319           pool_[c] = pool_[i]<pool_[i+1]? pool_[i]: pool_[i+1];
00320           idx = c%2==0? c: c-1;
00321         }
00322         
00323         c++;
00324         i += 2;
00325       }
00326       
00327       return &pool_[idx];
00328     }
00329 
00330     T_TREE_NODE_* getTop()
00331     {
00332       if (data_c_==0)
00333         return NULL;
00334 
00335       if (data_c_==1)
00336         return &pool_[0];
00337 
00338       return &pool_[data_c_*2-2];
00339     }
00340 
00341     T_TREE_NODE_* grow()
00342     {
00343       if (data_c_==0)
00344         return NULL;
00345 
00346       if (data_c_==1)
00347         return &pool_[0];
00348 
00349       uint32_t i = 0;
00350       uint32_t c = data_c_;
00351       while (i+1<c)
00352       {
00353         pool_[c] = pool_[i]<pool_[i+1]? pool_[i]: pool_[i+1];
00354         c++;
00355         i += 2;
00356       }
00357 
00358       return &pool_[data_c_*2-2];
00359     }
00360 
00361   friend ostream& operator <<(ostream& os, const TREE_BUCKET_& v)
00362     {
00363       os<<"["<<v.data_c_<<"]";
00364       for(uint32_t i=0; i<2*v.data_c_-1; i++)
00365         os<<v.pool_[i]<<",";
00366       return os;
00367     }
00368     
00369 
00370   };

00502   bool t_checkSortedPool()
00503   {
00504     for(typename vector<PRE_KEY_POINTER_*>::iterator i=sorted_pool_.begin(); i<sorted_pool_.end();i++)
00505     {
00506       for (uint32_t j=0; j<per_block_; j++)
00507       {
00508         if (j>1 && (*i)[j]<(*i)[j-1])
00509         {
00510           cout<<"\nFaild!\n";
00511           return false;
00512         }
00513       }
00514     }
00515 
00516     return true;
00517   }

00571   
00575   bool t_checkOutputFile()
00576   {
00577     const uint16_t read_size = sizeof(uint16_t)+sizeof(PRE_KEY_TYPE);
00578     
00579     FILE* f = fopen(outputFileNm_.c_str(), "r");
00580     if (f ==NULL)
00581     {
00582       LDBG_<<"Can not open output file: "<<outputFileNm_;
00583       return false;
00584     }
00585 
00586     uint64_t count = 0;
00587     if(fread(&count, sizeof(uint64_t), 1, f)!=1)
00588     {
00589       LDBG_<<"Reading count faild in file: "<<outputFileNm_;
00590       fclose(f);
00591       return false;
00592     }
00593 
00594     //cout<<count<<endl;
00595     
00596     PRE_KEY_TYPE last_key = 0;
00597     for (uint64_t j=0; j<count; j++)
00598     {
00599       char rec[read_size];
00600         
00601       if(fread(rec, read_size, 1, f)!=1)
00602       {
00603         LDBG_<<"Reading record faild in output file: "<<outputFileNm_<<j;
00604         fclose(f);
00605         return false;
00606       }
00607 
00608       PRE_KEY_TYPE k = *(PRE_KEY_TYPE*)(rec+sizeof(uint16_t));
00609 
00610       if (k<last_key)
00611       {
00612         cout<<"\nOutput checking faild!\n";
00613         return false;
00614       }
00615       last_key = k;
00616       
00617       fseek(f,(*(uint16_t*)rec)-sizeof(PRE_KEY_TYPE) ,SEEK_CUR);
00618     }
00619 
00620     return true;
00621   }
00622   
00623 protected:
00624   size_t push2rawPool(PRE_KEY_POINTER_* p)
00625   {
00626     bool f = true;
00627     while (f)
00628     {
00629       boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(input_mutex_);  
00630       f = raw_pool_.size()>=in_mem_blk_amnt_;
00631     }
00632     
00633     {
00634       boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(input_mutex_);  
00635       raw_pool_.push_back(p);
00636       
00637       return raw_pool_.size();
00638     }
00639   }
00640 
00641   PRE_KEY_POINTER_* popFromRawPool()
00642   {
00643     bool f = true;
00644     while (f)
00645     {
00646       {
00647         boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(input_mutex_);
00648         f = (raw_pool_.size()==0);
00649       }
00650       if (f && isInputDone())
00651         return NULL;
00652     }
00653 
00654     {
00655       boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(input_mutex_);  
00656       PRE_KEY_POINTER_* tmp = raw_pool_.back();
00657       raw_pool_.pop_back();
00658       return tmp;
00659     }    
00660   }
00661 
00662   void inputDone()
00663   {
00664     boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(is_input_mutex_);
00665     isInputed_ = true;
00666   }
00667 
00668   bool isInputDone()
00669   {
00670     boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(is_input_mutex_);
00671     if (isInputed_)
00672       return true;
00673 
00674     return false;
00675   }

00680   uint64_t inputThread()
00681   {
00682     PRE_KEY_POINTER_* block = new PRE_KEY_POINTER_[per_block_];
00683     uint32_t c = 0;
00684     const uint16_t read_size = sizeof(uint16_t)+sizeof(PRE_KEY_TYPE);
00685     
00686     for (vector<string>::iterator i=input_files_.begin(); i!=input_files_.end();i++)
00687     {
00688       FILE* f = fopen((*i).c_str(), "r");
00689       if (f == NULL)
00690       {
00691         LDBG_<<"Can not open file: "<<(*i);
00692         return (uint64_t)-1;
00693       }
00694 
00695       uint64_t count = 0;
00696       if (fread(&count, sizeof(uint64_t), 1, f)!=1)
00697       {
00698         LDBG_<<"Reading count faild in file: "<<*i;
00699         continue;
00700       }
00701       
00702       for (uint64_t j=0; j<count; j++)
00703       {
00704         char rec[read_size];
00705         uint64_t pos = ftell(f);
00706         
00707         if(fread(rec, read_size, 1, f)!=1)
00708         {
00709           LDBG_<<"Reading "<<j<<" record faild in file: "<<*i;
00710           continue;
00711         }
00712         
00713         if (c == per_block_)
00714         {
00715           uint64_t addr = ftell(f);
00716           sort(block);
00717           fseek(f, addr, SEEK_SET);
00718           //push2rawPool(block);
00719           blk_amnt_++;
00720           block = new PRE_KEY_POINTER_[per_block_];            
00721           c = 0;
00722         }
00723 
00724         block[c] = PRE_KEY_POINTER_ (*(PRE_KEY_TYPE*)(rec+sizeof(uint16_t)), pos,f);
00725         c++;
00726 
00727         data_amount_++;
00728         fseek(f, (*(uint16_t*)rec)-sizeof(PRE_KEY_TYPE), SEEK_CUR);
00729         //start += (*(uint16_t*)rec)+sizeof(PRE_KEY_TYPE);
00730       }
00731     }
00732 
00733     
00734     if (c <= per_block_)
00735     {
00736       while(c < per_block_)
00737       {
00738         block[c] = PRE_KEY_POINTER_ ();
00739         c++;
00740       }
00741       blk_amnt_++;
00742       sort(block);
00743       //push2rawPool(block);
00744     }
00745 
00746     inputDone();
00747 
00749     fflush(tempFile_);
00750 
00751     cs_makeTournamentTree();
00752     
00753     cs_treeGrow();
00754     
00755     return data_amount_;
00756   }
00757 
00761   void sort(PRE_KEY_POINTER_* block)
00762   {
00763     quickSort(block, 0, per_block_-1);
00764       
00765     if( sorted_pool_.size()<in_mem_blk_amnt_)
00766       sorted_pool_.push_back(block);
00767     else
00768     {
00769       //write into temple file
00770       add2TempFile(block);
00771     }
00772   }
00773 
00777   void sortThread()
00778   {
00779     PRE_KEY_POINTER_* block = popFromRawPool();
00780     while (block!=NULL)
00781     {
00782       quickSort(block, 0, per_block_-1);
00783       
00784       if( sorted_pool_.size()<in_mem_blk_amnt_)
00785         sorted_pool_.push_back(block);
00786       else
00787       {
00788         //write into temple file
00789         add2TempFile(block);
00790       }
00791       block = popFromRawPool();
00792     }
00793     
00794     fflush(tempFile_);
00795     // sorted all blocks, then use tournament tree to merge
00796     cs_makeTournamentTree();
00797     //cs_printTournamentTree();
00798     
00799     cs_treeGrow();
00800   }
00801   
00805   void cs_treeGrow()
00806   {
00807     FILE* f = fopen(outputFileNm_.c_str(), "w+");
00808     if (f==NULL)
00809     {
00810       LDBG_<<"Can not open file: "<<outputFileNm_;
00811       return;
00812     }
00813 
00814     if(fwrite(&data_amount_, sizeof(uint64_t), 1, f)!=1)
00815     {
00816       LDBG_<<"Can't write data amount: ";
00817       return;
00818     }
00819     
00820     T_TREE_NODE_* top = (*cs_tree_pool_.back())[0]->getTop();
00821     //writeOutputBuff(top->key_);
00822     output(f, top->key_);
00823     
00824     while (!top->isMax())
00825     {      
00826       PRE_KEY_POINTER_* block;
00827       T_TREE_NODE_ newNode;
00828       getSortedBlockOf(top->idx_, &block);
00829       
00830       if (top->idx_in_block_<per_block_-1)
00831         newNode = T_TREE_NODE_(block[top->idx_in_block_+1], top->idx_, top->idx_in_block_+1);
00832 
00833       //find the smallest at bottom line
00834       size_t i = cs_tree_pool_.size()-1;
00835       uint32_t j = 0;
00836 
00837       while (i>0)
00838       {
00839         TREE_BUCKET_* bu = (*cs_tree_pool_[i])[j];
00840         uint32_t j1 = bu->find(*top);
00841         if (j1 ==(uint32_t) -1)
00842         {
00843           j++;
00844           IF_DLOG(j==cs_tree_pool_[i]->size())<<"TREE_BUCKET_: 1";
00845           
00846           bu = (*cs_tree_pool_[i])[j];
00847           j1 = bu->find(*top);
00848           if (j1== (uint32_t)-1)
00849           {
00850             LDBG_<<"TREE_BUCKET_: 2";
00851             return ;
00852           }
00853           
00854         }
00855         
00856         j = (j*ND_CACHE_MAX_LEN + j1)*2;
00857         i--;
00858       }
00859       
00860       if ((*cs_tree_pool_[i])[j]->find(*top)==(uint32_t)-1)
00861       {
00862         j++;
00863         if ((*cs_tree_pool_[i])[j]->find(*top)==(uint32_t)-1)
00864         {
00865           LDBG_<<"TREE_BUCKET_: 3";
00866           return;
00867         }
00868       }
00869       
00870       //replace
00871       i = 0;
00872       while (i<cs_tree_pool_.size())
00873       {        
00874         T_TREE_NODE_* newTop = (*cs_tree_pool_[i])[j]->replace(*top, newNode);
00875 
00876         if(newTop == NULL)
00877         {          
00878           LDBG_<<"TREE_BUCKET_: 4";
00879           return;
00880         }
00881 
00882         if (j%2==0)
00883         {
00884           if (j<cs_tree_pool_[i]->size()-1)
00885           {
00886             top = *top<*(*cs_tree_pool_[i])[j+1]->getTop()? top:(*cs_tree_pool_[i])[j+1]->getTop();
00887             newTop = *newTop<*(*cs_tree_pool_[i])[j+1]->getTop()? newTop: (*cs_tree_pool_[i])[j+1]->getTop();
00888           }
00889         }
00890         else
00891         {
00892           top = *top<*(*cs_tree_pool_[i])[j-1]->getTop()? top:(*cs_tree_pool_[i])[j-1]->getTop();
00893           newTop = *newTop<*(*cs_tree_pool_[i])[j-1]->getTop()? newTop: (*cs_tree_pool_[i])[j-1]->getTop();
00894         }
00895         
00896         newNode = *newTop;
00897         
00898         j = j/2/ND_CACHE_MAX_LEN;
00899         i++;
00900       }
00901       
00902       *top = newNode;
00903       //writeOutputBuff(top->key_);
00904       output(f, top->key_);
00905     }
00906 
00907     fclose(f);
00908   }
00909 
00913   void output(FILE* f,const PRE_KEY_POINTER_& k)
00914   {
00915     if (f==NULL || k.f_==NULL)
00916       return;
00917         
00918     uint16_t len;
00919 
00920     fseek(k.f_, k.rcrd_addr_, SEEK_SET);
00921     if (fread(&len, sizeof(uint16_t), 1, k.f_)!=1)
00922     {
00923       LDBG_<<"can't read len of record!";
00924       return;
00925     }
00926 
00927     if (fwrite(&len, sizeof(uint16_t), 1, f)!=1)
00928     {
00929       LDBG_<<"can't write len of record!";
00930       return;
00931     }
00932       
00933     char buf[len];
00934     if (fread(buf, len, 1, k.f_)!=1)
00935     {
00936       LDBG_<<"can't read record!";
00937       return;
00938     }
00939       
00940     if (fwrite(buf, len, 1, f)!=1)
00941     {
00942       LDBG_<<"can't write record!";
00943       return;
00944     }
00945 
00946     return;
00947     
00948   }
00949   
00953   void outputThread()
00954   {
00955     FILE* f = fopen(outputFileNm_.c_str(), "w+");
00956     if (f==NULL)
00957     {
00958       LDBG_<<"Can not open file: "<<outputFileNm_;
00959       return;
00960     }
00961 
00962     if(fwrite(&data_amount_, sizeof(uint64_t), 1, f)!=1)
00963     {
00964       LDBG_<<"Can't write data amount: ";
00965       return;
00966     }
00967     
00968     while(read_output_idx_<data_amount_)
00969     {
00970       PRE_KEY_POINTER_ k;
00971       readOutputBuff(&k);
00972       uint16_t len;
00973 
00974       fseek(k.f_, k.rcrd_addr_, SEEK_SET);
00975       if (fread(&len, sizeof(uint16_t), 1, k.f_)!=1)
00976       {
00977         LDBG_<<"can't read len of record!";
00978         return;
00979       }
00980 
00981       if (fwrite(&len, sizeof(uint16_t), 1, f)!=1)
00982       {
00983         LDBG_<<"can't write len of record!";
00984         return;
00985       }
00986       
00987       char buf[len];
00988       if (fread(buf, len, 1, k.f_)!=1)
00989       {
00990         LDBG_<<"can't read record!";
00991         return;
00992       }
00993       
00994       if (fwrite(buf, len, 1, f)!=1)
00995       {
00996         LDBG_<<"can't write record!";
00997         return;
00998       }
00999     }
01000 
01001     fclose(f);
01002   }
01003 
01007   void writeOutputBuff(const PRE_KEY_POINTER_& k)
01008   {
01009     bool f = true;
01010     while(f)
01011       {
01012         boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(output_mutex_);
01013         f = write_output_idx_ - read_output_idx_ >= output_buffer_size_;
01014       }
01015     
01016     
01017       boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(output_mutex_);
01018       output_buffer_[write_output_idx_%output_buffer_size_] = k;
01019       
01020     write_output_idx_++;
01021   }
01022 
01026   void readOutputBuff(PRE_KEY_POINTER_* p)
01027   {
01028     bool f = true;
01029     while(f)
01030     {
01031       boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(output_mutex_);
01032       f = read_output_idx_>=write_output_idx_;
01033     }
01034     
01035     
01036       boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(output_mutex_);
01037       *p = output_buffer_[read_output_idx_%output_buffer_size_];
01038       
01039     read_output_idx_++;
01040   }
01041 
01045   bool add2TempFile(PRE_KEY_POINTER_* block)
01046   {
01047     if (tempFile_ == NULL)
01048       return false;
01049 
01050     if(fwrite(block, CACHE_BLOCK_SIZE, 1, tempFile_)!=1)
01051     {
01052       LDBG_<<"can't write to temple file.";
01053       return false;
01054     }
01055     
01056     return true;
01057   }
01058 
01062   void getSortedBlockOf(uint64_t idx, PRE_KEY_POINTER_** block)
01063   {
01064     if (idx<sorted_pool_.size())
01065     {
01066       *block = sorted_pool_[idx];
01067       return;
01068     }
01069 
01070     readFromTempFile(idx);
01071     *block = mediaBlock_;
01072   }
01073 
01077   bool readFromTempFile(uint64_t idx)
01078   {
01079     if (tempFile_ == NULL)
01080       return false;
01081     
01082     if (sorted_pool_.size() != in_mem_blk_amnt_)
01083       LDBG_<<"sorted pool size is different from block amount."<<sorted_pool_.size()<<in_mem_blk_amnt_;
01084     
01085     if (tempFile_ == NULL)
01086       return false;
01087 
01088     if (idx == mediaIdx_)
01089       return true;
01090 
01091     mediaIdx_ = idx;
01092     if (idx< in_mem_blk_amnt_)
01093     {
01094       LDBG_<<"Index error while reading temple file.";
01095       return false;
01096     }
01097     
01098     fseek(tempFile_, (idx-in_mem_blk_amnt_)*CACHE_BLOCK_SIZE ,SEEK_SET);
01099 
01100     if(fread(mediaBlock_, CACHE_BLOCK_SIZE, 1, tempFile_)!=1)
01101     {
01102       LDBG_<<"can't read temple file.";
01103       return false;
01104     }
01105 
01106     return true;
01107   }
01108   
01112   void swap(PRE_KEY_POINTER_* a, PRE_KEY_POINTER_* b)
01113   {
01114     PRE_KEY_POINTER_ temp;
01115     temp = *a;
01116     *a = *b;
01117     *b = temp;
01118   }
01119 
01123   uint32_t findMedianIndex(PRE_KEY_POINTER_* array, uint32_t left, uint32_t right)
01124   {
01125     return (left+right)/2;
01126     
01127     PRE_KEY_POINTER_ min = array[left];
01128     PRE_KEY_POINTER_ max = array[left];
01129     uint32_t shift = 5;
01130 
01131     if (right-left<2*shift)
01132       return (left+right)/2;
01133     
01134     for (uint32_t i=left+shift; i<=right; i+=shift)
01135     {
01136       if (array[i]<min)
01137       {
01138         min = array[i];
01139         continue;
01140       }
01141 
01142       if (array[i] > max)
01143       {
01144         max = array[i];
01145         continue;
01146       }
01147     }
01148 
01149     PRE_KEY_TYPE average = (min.pre_key_+max.pre_key_)/2;
01150     uint32_t idx = left;
01151     PRE_KEY_TYPE minGap = average>array[idx].pre_key_? average-array[idx].pre_key_ : array[idx].pre_key_-average;
01152     
01153     for (uint32_t i=left+shift; i<=right; i+=shift)
01154     {
01155       PRE_KEY_TYPE gap = average>array[i].pre_key_? average-array[i].pre_key_ : array[i].pre_key_-average;
01156       if (gap<minGap)
01157       {
01158         minGap = gap;
01159         idx = i;
01160       }
01161     }
01162 
01163     return idx;
01164   }
01165   
01169   uint32_t partition(PRE_KEY_POINTER_* array, uint32_t left, uint32_t right)
01170   {
01171     uint32_t pivotIndex = findMedianIndex(array, left, right), index = left, i;
01172     PRE_KEY_POINTER_ pivotValue = array[pivotIndex];
01173  
01174     swap(&array[pivotIndex], &array[right]);
01175     
01176     for(i = left; i < right; i++)
01177     {
01178       if(array[i] < pivotValue)
01179       {
01180         swap(&array[i], &array[index]);
01181         index += 1;
01182       }
01183     }
01184     swap(&array[right], &array[index]);
01185  
01186     return index;
01187   }
01188 
01192   void quickSort(PRE_KEY_POINTER_* array, uint32_t left, uint32_t right)
01193   {
01194     if(right-left<=1)
01195     {
01196       if (array[left]>array[right])
01197         swap(&array[left], &array[right]);
01198       return;
01199     }
01200     
01201     uint32_t idx = partition(array, left, right);
01202     
01203     if(idx>0 && left<idx-1)
01204       quickSort(array, left, idx - 1);
01205     if (idx<per_block_-1 && idx+1<right)
01206       quickSort(array, idx + 1, right);
01207   }
01208 
01212   void cs_makeTournamentTree()
01213   {
01214     TREE_BUCKET_* b = new TREE_BUCKET_();
01215     vector<TREE_BUCKET_*>* leaf = new vector<TREE_BUCKET_*>;
01216 
01218     uint64_t c= 0;
01219     for(typename vector<PRE_KEY_POINTER_*>::iterator i=sorted_pool_.begin(); i!=sorted_pool_.end()&&c<blk_amnt_;i++,c++)
01220     {
01221       if (b->isFull())
01222       {
01223         b->grow();
01224         leaf->push_back(b);
01225         b = new TREE_BUCKET_();
01226       }
01227       b->newNode(T_TREE_NODE_((*i)[0], c, 0));
01228     }
01229     
01230     for(;c<blk_amnt_;c++)
01231     {
01232       if (b->isFull())
01233       {
01234         b->grow();
01235         leaf->push_back(b);
01236         b = new TREE_BUCKET_();
01237       }
01238       
01239       PRE_KEY_POINTER_* kb;
01240       getSortedBlockOf(c, &kb);
01241       b->newNode(T_TREE_NODE_(*kb, c, 0));
01242     }
01243 
01244     if (!b->isEmpty())
01245     {
01246       b->grow();
01247       leaf->push_back(b);
01248       cs_tree_pool_.push_back(leaf);
01249     }
01250     
01252     vector<TREE_BUCKET_*>* last = leaf;
01253     while(last->size()>1)
01254     {
01255       leaf = new vector<TREE_BUCKET_*>;
01256       b = new TREE_BUCKET_();
01257 
01258       //for (typename vector<TREE_BUCKET_*>::iterator i=last->begin(); i!=last->end();i++)
01259       for (size_t i=0; i<last->size()-1; i+=2)
01260       {
01261         if (b->isFull())
01262         {
01263           b->grow();
01264           leaf->push_back(b);
01265           b = new TREE_BUCKET_();
01266         }
01267         b->newNode(*(*last)[i]->getTop()<*(*last)[i+1]->getTop()?
01268                    *(*last)[i]->getTop(): *(*last)[i+1]->getTop());
01269       }
01270 
01271       if (last->size()%2==1)
01272       {
01273         if (b->isFull())
01274         {
01275           b->grow();
01276           leaf->push_back(b);
01277           b = new TREE_BUCKET_();
01278         }
01279         b->newNode(*(last->back()->getTop()));
01280       }
01281       
01282 
01283       if (b->isEmpty())
01284         continue;
01285 
01286       b->grow();
01287       leaf->push_back(b);
01288       cs_tree_pool_.push_back(leaf);
01289 
01290       last = leaf;
01291     }
01292     
01293   }

01304   vector<PRE_KEY_POINTER_*> sorted_pool_;

01311   uint64_t data_amount_;
